sqrt(2) = 1.414213562373095D0
sqrt(2)/2 = 0.707106781186548D0
sqrt(2)/4 = 0.353553390593274D0
sqrt(2)/8 = 0.176776695296637D0
sqrt(2)/10 = 0.141421356237310D0
sqrt(2)/16 = 0.088388347648318D0
sqrt(2)*1.25 = 1.767766952966369D0
sqrt(2)*1.5 = 2.121320343559643D0
sqrt(2)*2 = 2.828427124746190D0
sqrt(2)*2.5 = 3.535533905932738D0
